attributes.action: the government to reconsider the proposed removal of the tax rebate on gas oil
attributes.additional_details:
The showmens guild of Great Britain represents the majority of travelling showmen 
for over 125 years 
This community has supported many local events fairs and galas
Helping numerous charities to provide fun days to thousands of children
attributes.background:
It has been proposed that the tax rebate on gas oil be removed 
This will cause the fairground industry considerable increased costs 
Thereby making some local fairs not financially viable 
Putting the businesses of many families at risk

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300530
